# `env`: Module

This module exports shared environment utilities for the AIO Commerce SDK.

## Functions

| Function                                              | Description                                                                                                                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [syncImsCredentials](functions/syncImsCredentials.md) | Syncs the IMS credentials environment variables from the configured IMS context in the .env file, in a way that is compatible with `@adobe/aio-commerce-lib-auth` |
